channel.title: Slayer EXP [667]

item.title: Slayer EXP [667]
item.dc:creator: @maccrash5 maccrash5
item.description:
@maccrash5 wrote:

sorry if wrong section but when i kill a slayer task monster i don’t get slayer xp or task does not decrease please give me a tutorial.
In npc.java there is a thing with:
if (killer.getTask()
!= null) {
if (getDefinitions().name.toLowerCase().equalsIgnoreCase(
killer.getTask().getName().toLowerCase())) {
killer.getSkills().addXp(Skills.SLAYER, 20000);
killer.player.getSlayerPoints());
killer.getTask().getXPAmount());
killer.getTask().decreaseAmount();
if (killer.getTask().getTaskAmount() < 1) {
killer.setTask(null);
killer.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“You have finished your slayer task, talk to a slayer master for a new one.”,
true);
return;
}
killer.getTask().setAmountKilled(
killer.getTask().getAmountKilled() + 1);
killer.getSkills().addXp(Skills.SLAYER, 20000);
killer.player.getSlayerPoints());
I don’t get any errors. PLZ Help. pm me ill give you my teamviewer.

Read full topic
